abstracts.cdata!:
The project consists of the first three
            years of the six-year investment plan to March 31, 1976. The
            first three years of the investment plan call for
            expenditures equivalent to US$87.80 million on specialized
            rolling stock, workshop and signalling equipment and a third
            ferry boat; and it includes progress payments on a fourth
            ferry boat to be delivered in the year to March 31, 1974.
            The rolling stock to be financed by the Bank will include
            490 flatcars for the transport of containers. The remaining
            1,310 freightcars for which financing would be provided from
            the Loan are intended for the transport of pulp and paper,
            steel, timber and other bulk traffic; in addition, certain
            workshop equipment and the modernization of signalling
            equipment on two lines are to be financed. Of the flatcars
            610 are to be manufactured in the Railways workshops using
            Bank-financed imported components.
